bibl.title: Poetae Comici Graeci (PCG). Vol. VII. Menecrates - Xenophon.
bibl.seg: Kassel Rudolf et Colin Austin, Poetae Comici Graeci (PCG). Vol. VII. Menecrates - Xenophon.
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 1989, 8°, xxxiii-813 pp.

C.R. par Thomas Gelzer, MusHelv 48 (1992) pp. 193-194. - Hans-Joachim Newiger, Gnomon 64 (1992) pp. 97-102. - Alan H. Sommerstein, CR N.S., 40 (1990) pp. 223-225. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 60 (1991) pp. 345-346. - André Wankenne, EtCl 58 (1990) p. 392. - Bernhard Zimmermann, Gymnasium 97 (1990) pp. 573-574. - Peter Rau, GGA 245 (1993) pp. 19-25.
